remarks: The variables in a subring polynomial algebra are the same as the original ring.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 5-Jul-2015.)
statement:
subrgvr1.x $e |- X = ( var1 ` R ) $.
subrgvr1.r $e |- ( ph -> T e. ( SubRing ` R ) ) $.
subrgvr1.h $e |- H = ( R |`s T ) $.
subrgvr1 $p |- ( ph -> X = ( var1 ` H ) ) $.
